SwissstatsR is the collaboration platform of the R working group within CORSTAT/KORSTAT, the Swiss Conference of regional statistical offices. The group comprises employees of 16 statistical offices of Switzerland. It was initiated by the Statistical Offices of Canton of St.Gallen and Canton of Zürich.
